City Council

Meetings

  • 6:30 pm
  • 1st and 3rd Thursday of every month
  • City Hall
    Council Chambers
    665 Country Club Road
    Lucas, TX 75002

Agendas & Minutes

Agendas are available prior to the meetings. Minutes are available following approval.

Overview

On occasion, the City Council may adjust its meeting dates, times, and locations. If you would like to speak at a City Council meeting, fill out a Request to Speak form (DOC).

Lucas City Council meetings are open to on-site visitors and can be livestreamed on the City website. If you would like to speak on a particular agenda item, but are unable to attend the meeting, please send an email to the City Secretary by 3:30 pm on the day of the meeting.

FAQs

How many Councilmembers are there?

Seven Councilmembers, including the Mayor.

How long is a Councilmember term?

The Mayor and Councilmembers shall be elected by the qualified voters of the entire City for a term of three years.

Where can I find City Council agendas and minutes?

You can find past and future City Council meeting agendas and minutes on the Agendas and Minutes page.
